short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click links for University of Southern California trojans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension provides you with a one-click pathway to every single online platform you need for USC assignments and courses. 

Links to: USC Blackboard, Gradescope, Piazza, MyUSC portal, Dining Menus, and Print Center
